title: Jan Havlena
text:
Jan Havlena (born 9 December 1998) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="MFK%20Chrudim">MFK Chrudim</a>.
Club career.
He made his professional debut in the <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a> for <a href="Virtus%20Entella">Entella</a> on 1 October 2016 in a game against <a href="Vicenza%20Calcio">Vicenza</a>. After three long injuries, latest an <a href="anterior%20cruciate%20ligament">anterior cruciate ligament</a> injury in January 2018, Havlena returned to the pitch in August 2018. However, he left Entella at the end of the season.
Ahead of the 2019-20 season, Havlena joined <a href="Bohemians%201905">Bohemians 1905</a> to play for the club's B-team. He played three games for the club before leaving on 22 February 2020 to join <a href="MFK%20Chrudim">MFK Chrudim</a>.
